1.0.name: wordpress/love-calculator
1.0.description: This love calculator evaluates the compatibility of two people based on names. The score range from 0%-100%. The higher the score the better, eg. Bill Clinton vs. Monica Lewinsky has a score of 90%. This calculator can be inserted either to the sidebar or into the post, but not both. Check http://www.calculator.net/love-calculator.html for a demo of this calculator.
